docs.snippet: The Los Angeles Clippers chose not to speak publicly about owner Donald Sterling before they faced the Golden State Warriors for Game 4 of their first-round series Sunday. Instead, they made a silent protest to generate attention....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers chose not to speak publicly about owner Donald Sterling before they faced the Golden State Warriors for Game 4 of their first-round series Sunday. Instead, they made a silent protest to generate attention.

headline.main: Clippers Stage Silent Protest to Owner

docs.snippet: The stewards of golf might want to think twice before tinkering with the golf hole....
docs.lead_paragraph: The stewards of golf might want to think twice before tinkering with the golf hole.
docs.abstract: News analysis; proposal by TaylorMade-Adidas Golf, manufacturer of golf equipment, to make the hole in golf the size of a birdbath or small foxhole stems from worry that game is too hard to play and is rapidly losing participants; difficulty of the game may, on the other hand, be a large part of its appeal for those who do play.

headline.main: A Birdbath-Size Hole and the Future of Golf
headline.print_headline: A Birdbath-Size Hole and the Future of Golf
